entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
